attributes.action: with his ministers to stop using double speak.  Honestly answer questions posed and stop treating the public like idiots.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition asking the Prime Minister, his minister and members of his party to be honest with the public.  How often have we heard members of the government(who are meant to represent us)refuse to answer a question when posed, using double speak or answer a completely different question.  I want politicians to be the best they can be, honest and responsible.  Unfortunately all to often they instead they come over as being smug and conniving.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
